text: is a Japanese politician. In October 2021, he became Minister of Finance for the Fumio Kishida cabinet.Shunichi Suzuki takes Japan finance reins as election and stimulus loom He has been a member of the House of Representatives as a Liberal Democratic Party. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Suzuki Shunichi profile, jimin.jp; accessed 18 June 2015. title: Shun'ichi Suzuki (politician)
